thread.title: Freeze Tag Announces Launch of New Facebook Game
thread.title_full: Freeze Tag Announces Launch of New Facebook Game

title: Freeze Tag Announces Launch of New Facebook Game
text:
Close 
Kitty Pawp: Bubble Shooter Launches on Social Platform Prior to Mobile Debut 
TUSTIN, CA, October 15, 2015 - Freeze Tag ( OTC: FRZT ), a leading creator of mobile social games, today announced its new free-to-play bubble shooter game called Kitty Pawp™: Bubble Shooter is now available on the Facebook platform all around the world. 
'Over the last several weeks, we've been reviewing analytics and improving performance on the mobile platform,' said Craig Holland, CEO of Freeze Tag, 'Our results have been very encouraging, so we decided to develop a Facebook version to help build an audience for the mobile game when it launches in November.' 
Kitty Pawp: Bubble Shooter is an arcade style, match three puzzle game similar to Bubble Witch 2 Saga and Angry Birds Pop. However, Kitty Pawp is all about cats: their likes (fishes), dislikes (hairballs), and everything in between. Bubble shooter games have become increasingly popular on desktop and mobile platforms. 
'About 40% of the mobile players of Kitty Pawp: Bubble Shooter have logged into Facebook,' said Craig Holland. 'When both versions are available, players who are logged into Facebook will be able to seamlessly move between the desktop and mobile version and keep their level progress, friends list and gifting all intact.' 
To play Kitty Pawp: Bubble Shooter on Facebook, go to this link: http://frzt.us/kpfbapp . 
About Freeze Tag, Inc. Freeze Tag, Inc. is a leading creator of mobile social games that are fun and engaging for all ages. Based on a free-to-play business model that has propelled games like Candy Crush Saga to worldwide success, we employ state-of-the-art data analytics and proprietary technology to dynamically optimize the gaming experience for revenue generation. Players can download and enjoy our games for free, or they can purchase virtual items and additional features within the game to increase the fun factor. Our games encourage players to compete and engage with their friends on major social networks such as Facebook and Twitter. Founded by gaming industry veterans, Freeze Tag has launched several successful mobile games including the number one hit series Victorian Mysteries® and Unsolved Mystery Club®, as well as digital entertainment like Etch A Sketch®. Freeze Tag games have been downloaded millions of times on the Apple, Amazon and Google app stores. 
Contact: info@freezetag.com 714-210-3850 x26
